message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great product for $11,500.  I think you'll find this price very competitive given its value.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $10,500 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $11,000.  This is my final offer.
